DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial examine effectiveness mechanical traction compare care usual non-surgical treatment Carpal Tunnel Syndrome ( CTS ) . Patients diagnosed CTS recruit outpatient neurology clinic VieCuri Medical Center Venlo , The Netherlands . They randomly assign intervention control group . Patients intervention group receive 12 treatment mechanical traction six consecutive week . Patients control group receive care usual , include splint , corticosteroid injection , carpal tunnel release surgery expectant strategy . Outcomes assessed baseline 3 , 6 , 12 month inclusion .
